content:
There are many must-visit sights in Greece during spring, here are some of them:

1. Athens: Spring is the perfect time to explore Athens, the capital city of Greece, as the weather is mild and perfect for sightseeing. Visit top attractions like the Acropolis, the Parthenon, and the Ancient Agora.

2. Meteora: The unique rock formations in Meteora are a wonder to behold. The monasteries, perched atop the towering rocks, offer fantastic views of the surrounding area.

3. Santorini: The iconic island of Santorini is a popular destination for its stunning views of the Aegean Sea. Take a dip in the warm waters of the sea, or enjoy a glass of wine overlooking the Caldera.

4. Mount Olympus: Spring is the perfect time to hike the trails that lead to the summit of Mount Olympus, the highest peak in Greece. The mountain is believed to be the home of the twelve Olympian gods and offers spectacular views of the surrounding landscape.

5. Delphi: Delphi is one of the most important archaeological sites in Greece and a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It is home to the famous Temple of Apollo, the Oracle, and the ancient theatre.

These are just a few of the many must-visit sights in Greece during spring. With its mild weather and fewer crowds, this is the perfect time to explore the country.
